description: Topojson with a typings definition file.
name: ts-topojson

scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cp -v README.md LICENSE.md dist/topojson.js dist/topojson.min.js ../topojson-bower && cd ../topojson-bower && git add README.md LICENSE.md topojson.js topojson.min.js && git commit -m "Release 0.0.11." && git tag -am "Release 0.0.11." v0.0.11 && git push && git push --tags && cd - && cp dist/topojson.js ../d3.github.com/topojson.v2.js && cp dist/topojson.min.js ../d3.github.com/topojson.v2.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add topojson.v2.js topojson.v2.min.js && git commit -m "topojson 0.0.11" && git push && cd - && zip -j dist/topojson.zip -- LICENSE.md README.md dist/topojson.js dist/topojson.min.js dist/topojson.d.ts
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && rollup -c --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n topojson -o dist/topojson.js -- index.js && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" dist/topojson.js -c negate_iife=false -m -o dist/topojson.min.js && cp bin/topojson.d.ts dist/topojson.d.ts
scripts.pretest: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && node rollup.node
